pages.text: The Expertise Orb is a powerful new craftable item that let's you gain Expertise Points even after reaching level 100.
Once you hit level 100, your completion crates will start to contain Arcane Essence, you will need to combine these into Arcane Shards!
You will need a pricey Orb Frame as well in order to craft the orb.
Once you have everything, you can craft it all together into the Expertise Orb, you can only use them when you are at least level 100.
